title: How long Britain could really fight for if war broke out tomorrow
subtitle: In the event of a war, one expert suggests the British Army could be incapable of fighting effectively on land within weeks, once committed - though  'much depends on the form of the conflict'.
full_text: In the event of a war, one expert suggests the British Army could be incapable of fighting effectively on land within weeks, once committed - though  'much depends on the form of the conflict'.
